title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
description: When using a dynamic text element to display the contents of a database field with three types of content: 1) HTML text within <html>...</html> tags, 2) HTML fragments not within <html> tags, and 3) Text with RTF tags, the dynamic text content type does not have any effect.
OB: The dynamic text content type does not affect the way the content is displayed.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a database field with three types of content: HTML text within <html>...</html> tags, HTML fragments not within <html> tags, and Text with RTF tags.
2. Add a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.
3. Verify that the dynamic text content type does not affect the way the content is displayed.
